docs.title: DENOG Routing Guide
docs.text: This guide is intended to act as a reference for best practices in Internet backbone routing. Its goal is to make the Internet more stable, secure and sustainable by educating both new and experienced network engineers.

docs.title: Working Group
docs.text: This guide is edited by the DENOG Routing Working Group. You don't need to be a member of the working group to contribute to the project.

docs.title: Contribute
docs.text: You can contribute to this routing guide on github.com/denog/routing-guide/ using GitHubs issues or pull request features. We have a Code of Conduct as a common ground for collaboration.
